alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lexington County through 345 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Cayce, Batesburg-Leesville, Springdale, Oak Grove, Red Bank, South Congaree, Columbia Metro Airport, Gilbert, Summit, Fredonia, Murray, Edmund, Camp Kinard, Barr Lake, Kneece and Red Bank Sports Complex. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 42 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
